MOVING.SERVICE.RESIDENTIAL.RATE.HEADER: 价格 (配一车和两个师傅)
MOVING.SERVICE.RESIDENTIAL.RATE.LABEL: 价格
MOVING.SERVICE.RESIDENTIAL.RATE.RULE.1: Any stops between start location and destination will be subject to a stop fee charge of $10/stop
MOVING.SERVICE.RESIDENTIAL.RATE.RULE.2: Traveling charge and fuel charge may apply to certain areas of GTA
MOVING.SERVICE.RESIDENTIAL.RATE.RULE.3: Stair fee $10 per floor. One-time charge
MOVING.SERVICE.RESIDENTIAL.RATE.RULE.4: Rate for an additional mover is $45/hr/person
MOVING.SERVICE.RESIDENTIAL.RATE.RULE.5: Piano is subject to additional charges of CAD$100
MOVING.SERVICE.RESIDENTIAL.RATE.RULE.6: Marble furniture is subject to additional charges of CAD$100
MOVING.SERVICE.RESIDENTIAL.RATE.RULE.7: Refrigerator is subject to additional charges of CAD$60
MOVING.SERVICE.RESIDENTIAL.RATE.RULE.8: Any location 100km away from Toronto is subject to long-distance mileage charge
MOVING.SERVICE.RESIDENTIAL.RATE.RULE.9: ong distance move is subject to a min. 2 hrs loading time and a min. 2 hrs of unloading time. *Applicable tax is extra
MOVING.SERVICE.RESIDENTIAL.RATE.RULE.10: For more detailed information regarding the long-distance move, please contact us at 4163008683
